description: Detects execution of attacker-controlled WsmPty.xsl or WsmTxt.xsl via winrm.vbs and copied cscript.exe (can be renamed)
name: AWL Bypass with Winrm.vbs and Malicious WsmPty.xsl/WsmTxt.xsl
query: (process.command_line.text:*winrm* AND process.command_line.text:(*format\:pretty* OR *format\:\"pretty\"* OR *format\:\"text\"* OR *format\:text*) AND (NOT (process.executable.text:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*))))
author: Julia Fomina
oscd.community
